Set a flag in the player class then re-send the anim I suppose, as per a timer?

Uhm, I need help with that

item.title: AFK 718 command Rune-Evo v3
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

[quote=“chewy099, post:1, topic:540831”]I made my own AFK comman for my server and below is the code except after 45 seconds the chair disappears. How can i add a loop for the player to sit until the player click on something in the game so then they aren’t sitting?

if (cmd[0].equals("afk")){ if(player.getRights() == 10){ player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(4117)); player.setNextForceTalk(new ForceTalk("<col=FF0000>I'll brb I'm going to be AKF!</col>")); return true; } if(player.getRights() == 0){ player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(4115)); player.setNextForceTalk(new ForceTalk("<col=FF0000>I'll brb I'm going to be AKF!</col>")); return true; } if(player.getRights() == 1){ player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(4111)); player.setNextForceTalk(new ForceTalk("<col=FF0000>I'll brb I'm going to be AKF!</col>")); return true; } if(player.getRights() == 2){ player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(4112)); player.setNextForceTalk(new ForceTalk("<col=FF0000>I'll brb I'm going to be AKF!</col>")); return true; } if(player.getRights() == 4 || player.getRights() == 5 || player.getRights() == 6){ player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(4115)); player.setNextForceTalk(new ForceTalk("<col=FF0000>I'll brb I'm going to be AKF!</col>")); return true; } } [/quote]

You should change the “AKF!” to “AFK!” in your force talk line.

Read full topic

item.title: AFK 718 command Rune-Evo v3
item.dc:creator: @chewy099 chewy099
item.description:
@chewy099 wrote:

I made my own AFK comman for my server and below is the code except after 45 seconds the chair disappears. How can i add a loop for the player to sit until the player click on something in the game so then they aren’t sitting?

if (cmd[0].equals("afk")){ if(player.getRights() == 10){ player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(4117)); player.setNextForceTalk(new ForceTalk("<col=FF0000>I'll brb I'm going to be AKF!</col>")); return true; } if(player.getRights() == 0){ player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(4115)); player.setNextForceTalk(new ForceTalk("<col=FF0000>I'll brb I'm going to be AKF!</col>")); return true; } if(player.getRights() == 1){ player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(4111)); player.setNextForceTalk(new ForceTalk("<col=FF0000>I'll brb I'm going to be AKF!</col>")); return true; } if(player.getRights() == 2){ player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(4112)); player.setNextForceTalk(new ForceTalk("<col=FF0000>I'll brb I'm going to be AKF!</col>")); return true; } if(player.getRights() == 4 || player.getRights() == 5 || player.getRights() == 6){ player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(4115)); player.setNextForceTalk(new ForceTalk("<col=FF0000>I'll brb I'm going to be AKF!</col>")); return true; } }

Read full topic
